short_description: happiness creation is a beauty salon based in sendai, japan.
generated_description: happiness creation co., ltd. is a japanese company that specializes in health and beauty consulting, planning, and sales of health and wellness-related equipment, supplements, and products. they also organize various events and seminars, as well as provide talent development services. in addition to running their own salons, they operate dry hair spa specialty stores and aesthetic salons as well. they offer dry hair spas, including the popular "happiness" and "month of happiness" dry hairspas, which specialize in pain relief, slimming, and relaxation. they are also a member of the dry hair spa specialist association and the association of medical practitioners.
generated_business_tags: dietary supplements | beauty and wellness equipment | event planning services for seminars | wholesale health and wellness products | staffing services | consulting services
